title: WTB Polar Bear hof card graded or raw 2.5 - 3 condition
author: Chuck9788

posts.post_title: WTB Polar Bear hof card graded or raw 2.5 - 3 condition
posts.post_content:
Hello, I am looking to possibly purchase a Polar Bear hof card for my collection. I would accept a raw card so long as it's not a reprint. If anyone can assist that would great! You can PM me or email me at [url]chucjginlv@yagoo.com[/url]

Thanks again,

Chuck in Las Vegas
